# [Interview #1150: Librarypalooza, Entry #21](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1150#21)

#### Paladin Brewer

Was aluminum used in the shattering of Adonalsium in any way?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO.
